description:
After ascending to the mysterious third level, Hakuno meets Alice, a cyber ghost living alone in this haunted wonderland.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Eikyuukikan Shoujo Teikoku: Queens Glass Game
Moteur éternel, l`empire des jeunes filles
The Perpetual Motion Machine: A Girl`s Empire - The Queen`s Glass Game
永久機関・少女帝国 クイーンズ・グラスゲーム
